Title: Up for Love
Writer: Marcos Carnevale (original screenplay: Corazon de Leon), Laurent Tirard (adaptation), Laurent Tirard (dialogue), Laurent Tirard (screenplay), Grégoire Vigneron (adaptation), Grégoire Vigneron (dialogue), Grégoire Vigneron (screenplay)
Actors: Jean Dujardin, Virginie Efira, Cédric Kahn, Stéphanie Papanian
Plot: A lawyer dating a dashing, wealthy architect four and a half feet tall gets ribbed by her family, employees and jealous ex about his stature.
